Package hearts.model

Class Set

  • java.lang.Object
    • hearts.model.Set
  • public class Set
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a set in a Hearts game. A set includes 4 cards, 1 from each player and there are 13 sets in a round. Has 2 default attributes, a list of cards and the index of player who last played a card.

      • getWinningCardIndex

        public int getWinningCardIndex()
        Returns the index of the card that wins the set.
        Returns:
        -1 if there are no cards in the set. otherwise, return the index of the winning card.

      • getWinningCard

        public Card getWinningCard()
        Returns the Card object that wins the set.
        Returns:
